mapper.select:
SELECT t_cashier_client.* FROM t_cashier_client WHERE 1=1
AND t_cashier_client.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_cashier_client.store_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.storeId},'%')
AND t_cashier_client.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.code},'%')
AND t_cashier_client.factory LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.factory},'%')
AND t_cashier_client.model LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.model},'%')
AND t_cashier_client.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
